thread.title: Very convenient and comfortable.
thread.title_full: Very convenient and comfortable. - Review of Premier Inn London Euston Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Carolinoe
title: Very convenient and comfortable.
text: Wanted central location near Euston station and this was perfect. As ever in other Premier Inns I have stayed, service was very good and we felt welcomed and secure. Our room on the 4th floor overlooked the Euston Road but we had undisturbed nights sleep due to the efficiency of the secondary glazing. Obviously you would here road noise if you opened the windows, but who would want to let all that pollution in!
